</Frame>

<div id="sharing-preview-deployments">
  ## 共享预览部署
</div>

预览部署可以对所有人公开，或仅限通过认证的用户访问。

**公开访问**：预览 URL 默认对所有人可见。将预览链接分享给需要审阅你更改的任何人。

**受限访问**：启用预览部署认证，将预览访问限制为仅已认证的 Mintlify 用户。更多信息参见 [Authentication Setup](/zh/deploy/authentication-setup)。


# 反向代理
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/deploy/reverse-proxy

配置自定义反向代理以为你的文档提供服务

<Note>
  仅 [Custom 方案](https://mintlify.com/pricing?ref=reverse-proxy) 支持反向代理配置。
</Note>

要通过自定义反向代理服务你的文档，你需要配置路由规则、缓存策略和请求头转发。

在实施反向代理时，请留意可能出现的 domain 验证、SSL 证书签发、认证流程、性能以及 Analytics 跟踪方面的问题。

<div id="routing-configuration">
  ## 路由配置
</div>

按以下缓存策略将这些路径代理到你的 Mintlify 子域：

| Path                              | Destination                     | Caching |
| --------------------------------- | ------------------------------- | ------- |
| `/.well-known/acme-challenge/*`   | `<your-subdomain>.mintlify.app` | 不缓存     |
| `/.well-known/vercel/*`           | `<your-subdomain>.mintlify.app` | 不缓存     |
| `/mintlify-assets/_next/static/*` | `<your-subdomain>.mintlify.app` | 启用缓存    |
| `/_mintlify/*`                    | `<your-subdomain>.mintlify.app` | 不缓存     |
| `/*`                              | `<your-subdomain>.mintlify.app` | 不缓存     |
| `/`                               | `<your-subdomain>.mintlify.app` | 不缓存     |

<div id="required-header-configuration">
  ## 必需的请求头配置
</div>

按以下请求头要求配置你的反向代理：

* **Origin**：包含目标子域 `<your-subdomain>.mintlify.app`
* **X-Forwarded-For**：保留客户端 IP 信息
* **X-Forwarded-Proto**：保留原始协议（HTTP/HTTPS）
* **X-Real-IP**：转发真实的客户端 IP 地址
* **User-Agent**：转发用户代理

<Warning>
  确保不要转发 `Host` 请求头
</Warning>

<div id="example-nginx-configuration">
  ## Nginx 配置示例
</div>

```nginx  theme={null}
server {
    listen 80;
    server_name <your-domain>.com;

    # Let's Encrypt 验证路径
    location ~ ^/\.well-known/acme-challenge/ {
        proxy_pass https://<your-subdomain>.mintlify.app;
        proxy_set_header Origin <your-subdomain>.mintlify.app;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
        proxy_set_header User-Agent $http_user_agent;

        # 禁用验证路径的缓存
        add_header Cache-Control "no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate";
    }

    # Vercel 验证路径
    location ~ ^/\.well-known/vercel/ {
        proxy_pass https://<your-subdomain>.mintlify.app;
        proxy_set_header Origin <your-subdomain>.mintlify.app;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
        proxy_set_header User-Agent $http_user_agent;

        # 禁用验证路径的缓存
        add_header Cache-Control "no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate";
    }

    # 带缓存的静态资源
    location ~ ^/mintlify-assets/_next/static/ {
        proxy_pass https://<your-subdomain>.mintlify.app;
        proxy_set_header Origin <your-subdomain>.mintlify.app;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
        proxy_set_header User-Agent $http_user_agent;

        # 启用静态资源缓存
        add_header Cache-Control "public, max-age=86400";
    }

    # Mintlify 特定路径
    location ~ ^/_mintlify/ {
        proxy_pass https://<your-subdomain>.mintlify.app;
        proxy_set_header Origin <your-subdomain>.mintlify.app;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
        proxy_set_header User-Agent $http_user_agent;

        # 禁用 Mintlify 路径的缓存
        add_header Cache-Control "no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate";
    }

    # 根路径
    location = / {
        proxy_pass https://<your-subdomain>.mintlify.app;
        proxy_set_header Origin <your-subdomain>.mintlify.app;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
        proxy_set_header User-Agent $http_user_agent;

        # 禁用动态内容的缓存
        add_header Cache-Control "no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate";
    }

    # 所有其他文档路径
    location / {
        proxy_pass https://<your-subdomain>.mintlify.app;
        proxy_set_header Origin <your-subdomain>.mintlify.app;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
        proxy_set_header User-Agent $http_user_agent;

        # 禁用动态内容的缓存
        add_header Cache-Control "no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate";
    }
}
```

<div id="troubleshooting">
  ## 疑难解答
</div>

<div id="404-error">
  ### 404 错误
</div>

**现象**：文档可以加载，但部分功能不可用。API 调用失败。

**原因**：转发了 `Host` 头，或缺少 `Origin` 头。

**解决方案**：

* 停止转发 `Host` 头
* 将 `Origin` 头设置为 `<your-subdomain>.mintlify.app`

<div id="performance-issues">
  ### 性能问题
</div>

**表现**：页面加载缓慢，出现布局位移。

**原因**：缓存配置不正确。

**解决方案**：仅对 `/mintlify-assets/_next/static/*` 路径启用缓存。


# AWS Route 53 与 CloudFront
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/deploy/route53-cloudfront

使用 AWS 服务在自定义子路径托管文档

要使用 AWS Route 53 和 CloudFront 将文档托管在 `yoursite.com/docs` 这样的自定义子路径下，你需要在 DNS（域名系统）提供商处进行配置，使其指向你的 CloudFront 分发。

<div id="repository-structure">
  ## 存储库结构
</div>

你需要在存储库中根据所选的子路径结构来组织文档文件。比如，如果你希望文档位于 `yoursite.com/docs`，则需要创建一个 `docs/` 目录，并将所有文档文件放入其中。

<div id="high-level-overview">
  ## 高层概览
</div>

将流量路由到以下路径，并将缓存策略设置为**CachingDisabled**：

* `/.well-known/acme-challenge/*` - Let's Encrypt 证书验证所需
* `/.well-known/vercel/*` - 用于 domain 验证
* `/docs/*` - 子路径路由所需
* `/docs/` - 子路径路由所需

将流量路由到以下路径，并将缓存策略设置为**CachingEnabled**：

* `/mintlify-assets/_next/static/*`
* `Default (*)` - 你的网站登录页

所有 Behaviors 的**origin request policy**都必须为 `AllViewerExceptHostHeader`。

<img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ/images/cloudfront/all-behaviors.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ&q=85&s=54d70b32256a271160dca8f51a85be43" alt="CloudFront &#x22;Behaviors&#x22; 页面包含 4 个行为：/docs/*、/docs、Default 和 /.well-known/*。" data-og-width="1603" width="1603" data-og-height="365" height="365" data-path="images/cloudfront/all-behaviors.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ/images/cloudfront/all-behaviors.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ&q=85&s=68a8af85258ac81883983503556ad026 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ/images/cloudfront/all-behaviors.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ&q=85&s=35386a988b71413602a9de7571d9d0b3 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ/images/cloudfront/all-behaviors.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ&q=85&s=2b0411253ef116b698c81aa90877b34d 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ/images/cloudfront/all-behaviors.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ&q=85&s=c8370b98c6a943fb94c68a19eced0e42 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ/images/cloudfront/all-behaviors.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ&q=85&s=688d3a4c1154fde50ff968998e08fe1e 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ/images/cloudfront/all-behaviors.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ&q=85&s=ce125cf98f6d34cdf2c060243b432e1e 2500w" />

<div id="create-cloudfront-distribution">
  ## 创建 CloudFront 分配
</div>

1. 在 AWS 控制台中前往 [CloudFront](https://aws.amazon.com/cloudfront)。
2. 选择 **Create distribution**。

<Frame>
    <img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/create-distribution.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=1f37db91b2641111d47cbe82f876c1ab" alt="CloudFront Distributions 页面，高亮显示 “Create distribution” 按钮。" data-og-width="3024" width="3024" data-og-height="922" height="922" data-path="images/cloudfront/create-distribution.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/create-distribution.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=cc5fc35ee1c3334c982d436bd0d3865e 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/create-distribution.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=669a0faf0e66f2a9bdab67d80d8b6084 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/create-distribution.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=82b3d82369374b4c337b4a4008ea02b4 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/create-distribution.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=3d643801e73cf04965f74e8724fffdfe 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/create-distribution.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=718ef2ed171cf07a8a42aaffb25dc060 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/create-distribution.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=1e4166cb54510da95c528070418e37d6 2500w" />
</Frame>

3. 在 Origin domain 中输入 `[SUBDOMAIN].mintlify.dev`，其中 `[SUBDOMAIN]` 是你项目的唯一子域。

<Frame>
    <img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/origin-name.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=449c149b3b39e8c429d8d51b0c42e3cb" alt="CloudFront “Create distribution” 页面显示 “acme.mintlify.dev” 作为 Origin domain。" data-og-width="1495" width="1495" data-og-height="1036" height="1036" data-path="images/cloudfront/origin-name.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/origin-name.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=5d5f5008f369f8c38e6703e2a759e7af 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/origin-name.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=3345083fc5eca46637b4b3d3b36d9fe5 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/origin-name.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=8b3b6e36df9aac3814183115f7170787 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/origin-name.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=822c9433c88215f9e36d792608099e71 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/origin-name.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=83469208f32395b02ba5ae82b2d3a19a 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/origin-name.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=e6142bca1498cbe52617e64a941d9a73 2500w" />
</Frame>

4. 在 “Web Application Firewall (WAF)” 中，启用安全防护。

<Frame>
    <img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/enable-security-protections.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=5906ebffd8e486eb062d57839190e8c0" alt="Web Application Firewall (WAF) 选项，已选择 “Enable security protections”。" data-og-width="1482" width="1482" data-og-height="877" height="877" data-path="images/cloudfront/enable-security-protections.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/enable-security-protections.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=39509f85c10584ac29c25f10d0b5548e 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/enable-security-protections.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=ded22f36c2e2968f7eec2b412fdeed45 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/enable-security-protections.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=1e0fc91ac5e00e2c98fb60182c9a832a 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/enable-security-protections.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=c39d4433d131807dc83df3504e13d9ee 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/enable-security-protections.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=945be03239f33c86006a1617f5b96fa6 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/enable-security-protections.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=d4d0ea6e430c1894ad02b6537c62e5f9 2500w" />
</Frame>

5. 其余设置保持默认。
6. 选择 **Create distribution**。

<div id="add-default-origin">
  ## 添加默认 Origin
</div>

1. 创建分发后，前往 “Origins” 标签页。

<Frame>
    <img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/cloudfront/origins.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=c7d2c7dbccf5b481d0a935014e383f88" alt="CloudFront 分发界面，高亮显示 “Origins” 标签页。" data-og-width="3024" width="3024" data-og-height="1466" height="1466" data-path="images/cloudfront/origins.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/cloudfront/origins.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=507b089d0cb19f1249c497c1eb860e35 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/cloudfront/origins.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=8fb97a407bae832c24f95290e5c49eb4 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/cloudfront/origins.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=cccacc7b2c23c927261a1cbce5742d1e 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/cloudfront/origins.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=b072b1f61138ac6f878b0a71e246ab4e 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/cloudfront/origins.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=e875456289310736a62a796a0213e164 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/cloudfront/origins.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=c50b04210ce9a0938b71dc6fd623eb61 2500w" />
</Frame>

2. 找到与你主域名对应的预发布环境 URL。具体取决于你的落地页托管方式。例如，Mintlify 的预发布 URL 是 [mintlify-landing-page.vercel.app](https://mintlify-landing-page.vercel.app)。

<Info>
  如果你的落地页托管在 Webflow 上，请使用 Webflow 的预发布 URL，通常为 `.webflow.io`。

  如果你使用 Vercel，请使用每个项目默认提供的 `.vercel.app` 域名。
</Info>

3. 新建一个 Origin，并将你的预发布 URL 填入 “Origin domain”。

<Frame>
    <img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/default-origin.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=431b8e69daee80418361d8e0df65aaa7" alt="CloudFront 的 “Create origin” 页面，高亮显示 “Origin domain” 输入框。" data-og-width="3024" width="3024" data-og-height="1332" height="1332" data-path="images/cloudfront/default-origin.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/default-origin.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=0192672b46582c1ae6e0cfab1c148a0e 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/default-origin.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=f703233de8846d03335ac59db3593477 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/default-origin.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=af17aba3b8dcb53f5c52a9dfbae56ab0 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/default-origin.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=4596db53f6895f7ae4a41c855731dc8c 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/default-origin.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=714110d7b3e0bab31bb044b9d973c382 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/default-origin.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=3da26c30610554351a3bd8f261f2807c 2500w" />
</Frame>

此时，你应当有两个 Origins：一个为 `[SUBDOMAIN].mintlify.app`，另一个为你的预发布 URL。

<Frame>
    <img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/final-origins.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=34c7c4de9810506a2bf5447c407c3707" alt="CloudFront 的 “Origins” 页面，包含两个 origins：一个用于 mintlify，另一个用于 mintlify-landing-page。" data-og-width="1230" width="1230" data-og-height="690" height="690" data-path="images/cloudfront/final-origins.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/final-origins.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=2d9d966efc42fe601f71b34cd75a440f 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/final-origins.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=5cb2e516bfac6ecd70704d96e2efe881 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/final-origins.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=f370500f5a779ef1ea07869999abf5b5 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/final-origins.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=3c1599fc0aeb4aaf7c55b0094133a0c4 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/final-origins.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=a70c21541625be38eafef7651756ed2f 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/final-origins.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=9e16dae71fccebc80d015fdd2f4c14a5 2500w" />
</Frame>

<div id="set-behaviors">
  ## 设置行为
</div>

CloudFront 中的行为用于控制子路径逻辑。总体而言，我们希望实现以下逻辑：

* **如果用户访问你的自定义子路径**，跳转到 `[SUBDOMAIN].mintlify.dev`。
* **如果用户访问其他任意页面**，跳转到当前登录页。

1. 打开 CloudFront 分配的 “Behaviors” 标签页。

<Frame>
    <img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/behaviors.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=c4509c758a6353ceee64b5d62ee66c7c" alt="突出显示 CloudFront “Behaviors” 标签页。" data-og-width="3024" width="3024" data-og-height="1384" height="1384" data-path="images/cloudfront/behaviors.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/behaviors.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=668d0905149b18b82ec126c61c0b215b 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/behaviors.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=a2509a0ce2738493a3fc6dc37be0f08d 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/behaviors.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=73d78087c73a8808dc9550fc1ded57ab 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/behaviors.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=66b36c3e19fd3eddf1c6ae31961ad63c 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/behaviors.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=94e69e532750b1445c6e2ff3f16cd58d 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/behaviors.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=73017a7f49e8a9e90a0b5de099503c8a 2500w" />
</Frame>

2. 点击 **Create behavior** 按钮，并创建以下行为。

<div id="well-known">
  ### `/.well-known/*`
</div>

为用于 Vercel 域名验证的路径创建一个 **Path pattern** 为 `/.well-known/*` 的行为，并将 **Origin and origin groups** 指向你的文档站点 URL。

在 "Cache policy" 中选择 **CachingDisabled**，以确保这些验证请求直通且不被缓存。

<Frame>
    <img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/cloudfront/well-known-policy.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=67ee03ce9da55fce3d969f481a7a2311" alt="CloudFront “Create behavior” 页面，&#x22;Path pattern&#x22; 为 &#x22;/.well-known/*&#x22;，&#x22;Origin and origin groups&#x22; 指向预发布环境的 URL。" data-og-width="1413" width="1413" data-og-height="1098" height="1098" data-path="images/cloudfront/well-known-policy.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/cloudfront/well-known-policy.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=1458960df73ee7dfb9f446ef55254ab7 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/cloudfront/well-known-policy.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=62040f828b220b8e4990b964caa8adc0 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/cloudfront/well-known-policy.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=eaf6263c3f39dec9aef6684893585a9c 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/cloudfront/well-known-policy.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=517e8db63c9f10c74d04ec0ab20cbed2 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/cloudfront/well-known-policy.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=248ec909df24ff948bbe4df30707536f 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/cloudfront/well-known-policy.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=e085be4ba08ce27c1da5538ee1e05086 2500w" />
</Frame>

<Info>
  如果 `.well-known/*` 过于宽泛，至少可以为 Vercel 将其细化为 2 个行为：

  * `/.well-known/vercel/*` - Vercel 域名验证所必需
  * `/.well-known/acme-challenge/*` - Let's Encrypt 证书验证所必需
</Info>

<div id="your-custom-subpath">
  ### 自定义子路径
</div>

使用你选定的子路径作为 **Path pattern** 创建一个行为（behavior），例如 `/docs`，并将 **Origin and origin groups** 指向 `.mintlify.dev` 的 URL（本例为 `acme.mintlify.dev`）。

* 将“Cache policy”设置为 **CachingOptimized**。
* 将“Origin request policy”设置为 **AllViewerExceptHostHeader**。
* 将“Viewer Protocol Policy”设置为 **Redirect HTTP to HTTPS**。

<Frame>
    <img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ/images/cloudfront/behavior-1.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ&q=85&s=1d09a38f55dc1fbfce58faf8a627a690" alt="CloudFront “Create behavior” 页面，&#x22;Path pattern&#x22; 为 “/docs/*”，&#x22;Origin and origin groups&#x22; 指向 acme.mintlify.dev 的 URL。" data-og-width="1520" width="1520" data-og-height="1117" height="1117" data-path="images/cloudfront/behavior-1.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ/images/cloudfront/behavior-1.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ&q=85&s=ab81a4e2de6ff0f07b5d307f5a46d774 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ/images/cloudfront/behavior-1.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ&q=85&s=0fb16e23b4b1b00d59e738f222d31906 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ/images/cloudfront/behavior-1.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ&q=85&s=49efb3aa2695a4fb9b89e2fb149ea67e 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ/images/cloudfront/behavior-1.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ&q=85&s=78fa6998929bf73878e06cab85482021 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ/images/cloudfront/behavior-1.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ&q=85&s=c3027c797a9d99717ffa999ce8bd04aa 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ/images/cloudfront/behavior-1.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ&q=85&s=5ba12d53255a26e6abcbc3d220d5b656 2500w" />
</Frame>

<div id="your-custom-subpath-with-wildcard">
  ### 带通配符的自定义子路径
</div>

创建一个行为，将你选定的子路径后接 `/*` 作为 **Path pattern**，例如 `/docs/*`，并将 **Origin and origin groups** 指向相同的 `.mintlify.dev` URL。

除 **Path pattern** 外，其他设置应与基础子路径行为完全一致。

* 将“Cache policy”设置为 **CachingOptimized**。
* 将“Origin request policy”设置为 **AllViewerExceptHostHeader**。
* 将“Viewer protocol policy”设置为 **Redirect HTTP to HTTPS**。

<div id="mintlify-assets_nextstatic">
  ### `/mintlify-assets/_next/static/*`
</div>

* 将“Cache policy”设置为 **CachingOptimized**
* 将“Origin request policy”设置为 **AllViewerExceptHostHeader**
* 将“Viewer protocol policy”设置为 **Redirect HTTP to HTTPS**

<div id="default">
  ### `Default (*)`
</div>

最后，我们将编辑 `Default (*)` 行为。

<Frame>
    <img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/default-behavior-1.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=2ad9479b2b06f137c9aac688921b0872" alt="已选中“Default (*)”行为并突出显示 Edit 按钮的 CloudFront 发行版。" data-og-width="3024" width="3024" data-og-height="1406" height="1406" data-path="images/cloudfront/default-behavior-1.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/default-behavior-1.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=801e5f0228591da6475af62aa32fd5af 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/default-behavior-1.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=1ca26ed54199ede2f36525b6a1f04221 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/default-behavior-1.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=6f03bebdcae8314aec927882a69da382 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/default-behavior-1.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=80a23009975c7af7f5569d7a8ae9a633 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/default-behavior-1.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=d3ac29cb1af13cabac0cab96eb0d01dc 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/default-behavior-1.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=4aadfb85a039e284dee36c9ec0ffa5c9 2500w" />
</Frame>

1. 将默认行为的 **Origin and origin groups** 更改为预发布环境的 URL（在我们的示例中为 `mintlify-landing-page.vercel.app`）。

<Frame>
    <img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/default-behavior-2.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=30463de43eebd7f624633f1757b87360" alt="CloudFront 的“Edit behavior”页面，突出显示了“Origin and origin groups”输入字段。" data-og-width="3024" width="3024" data-og-height="1298" height="1298" data-path="images/cloudfront/default-behavior-2.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/default-behavior-2.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=4514f68842aba48bf4ef44a5fdc81912 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/default-behavior-2.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=da2ad97fb54d35d6d1bc720d92d3e1fa 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/default-behavior-2.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=3aec1153063a872ba1d50f35dd31a5b9 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/default-behavior-2.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=56f77c60898ce9b96d970bcb417f53b0 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/default-behavior-2.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=f0445a8b875159363012f5154f3ba1e9 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/default-behavior-2.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=7f4f5395c901abb4086540a1ce3dba77 2500w" />
</Frame>

2. 选择 **保存更改**。

<div id="check-behaviors-are-set-up-correctly">
  ### 检查行为是否配置正确
</div>

如果你按上述步骤操作，行为配置应如下所示：

<Frame>
    <img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ/images/cloudfront/all-behaviors.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ&q=85&s=54d70b32256a271160dca8f51a85be43" alt="CloudFront “Behaviors” 页面，包含 4 个行为：/docs/*、/docs、Default 和 /.well-known/*。" data-og-width="1603" width="1603" data-og-height="365" height="365" data-path="images/cloudfront/all-behaviors.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ/images/cloudfront/all-behaviors.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ&q=85&s=68a8af85258ac81883983503556ad026 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ/images/cloudfront/all-behaviors.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ&q=85&s=35386a988b71413602a9de7571d9d0b3 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ/images/cloudfront/all-behaviors.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ&q=85&s=2b0411253ef116b698c81aa90877b34d 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ/images/cloudfront/all-behaviors.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ&q=85&s=c8370b98c6a943fb94c68a19eced0e42 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ/images/cloudfront/all-behaviors.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ&q=85&s=688d3a4c1154fde50ff968998e08fe1e 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ/images/cloudfront/all-behaviors.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ&q=85&s=ce125cf98f6d34cdf2c060243b432e1e 2500w" />
</Frame>

<div id="preview-distribution">
  ## 预览分发
</div>

你现在可以进入 “General” 标签页并访问 **Distribution domain name** 的 URL，来测试分发是否已正确配置。

<Frame>
    <img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/cloudfront/preview-distribution.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=26261c7fb8b2aea6e488baebd81da561" alt="CloudFront “General” 标签页，高亮显示 “Distribution domain name” 的 URL。" data-og-width="3024" width="3024" data-og-height="1394" height="1394" data-path="images/cloudfront/preview-distribution.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/cloudfront/preview-distribution.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=00d0c20e49e022f9409a610200fb80b4 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/cloudfront/preview-distribution.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=179ae97c29db945fbac4112ac981e204 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/cloudfront/preview-distribution.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=77613d4d70196f5f355d3f50bb1eb9a5 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/cloudfront/preview-distribution.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=3ab4603cd24a1a31bdf7d36605fdaf86 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/cloudfront/preview-distribution.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=ac992029b7bb63b7865d470b63075fbe 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/cloudfront/preview-distribution.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=1001b4e5d85d354d0f407c70524ea175 2500w" />
</Frame>

所有页面应当指向你的主着陆页；但如果在该 URL 后追加你选择的子路径（例如 `/docs`），则应会跳转到你的 Mintlify 文档实例。

<div id="connect-with-route53">
  ## 连接 Route53
</div>

现在，我们将把 CloudFront 分配的功能接入到你的主域名。

<Note>
  本节你也可以参考 AWS 的官方指南：[将 Amazon Route 53 配置为将流量路由到 CloudFront 分配](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/Route53/latest/DeveloperGuide/routing-to-cloudfront-distribution.html#routing-to-cloudfront-distribution-config)
</Note>

1. 在 AWS 控制台中进入 [Route53](https://aws.amazon.com/route53)。
2. 进入主域名的“Hosted zone”。
3. 选择 **Create record**。

<Frame>
    <img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/cloudfront/route53-create-record.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=485f0365b67628b64b79a14ad6342da6" alt="Route 53 的“Records”页面，突出显示“Create record”按钮。" data-og-width="1540" width="1540" data-og-height="1238" height="1238" data-path="images/cloudfront/route53-create-record.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/cloudfront/route53-create-record.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=38fc9443b532bd46e59158e5a8946bef 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/cloudfront/route53-create-record.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=0ff0c115bb706bca07cb98c4ed60ce0f 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/cloudfront/route53-create-record.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=99150636009d8b8b6570acdbbfd2199b 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/cloudfront/route53-create-record.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=dbd65372b9670081fd007ae5ecd20465 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/cloudfront/route53-create-record.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=1b4004391efd2aa7227fa03f1694ac6f 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/cloudfront/route53-create-record.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=59525323cba5793ad2e9924d768d9cf1 2500w" />
</Frame>

4. 打开 `Alias`，然后在 **Route traffic to** 中选择 `Alias to CloudFront distribution` 选项。

<Frame>
    <img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/create-record-alias.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=1d56653e164128d0de8347cb8e2abb89" alt="Route 53 的“Create record”页面，突出显示“Alias”开关和“Route traffic to”菜单。" data-og-width="3024" width="3024" data-og-height="1494" height="1494" data-path="images/cloudfront/create-record-alias.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/create-record-alias.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=f888ce7c89be2bdb6f90d640779e8210 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/create-record-alias.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=997e91b14a4f9c8c5b95bff32587d322 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/create-record-alias.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=2fa923401806b5ca36e1711b43add64e 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/create-record-alias.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=fc423fed0cfec1e8076d2af86f9bcb8a 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/create-record-alias.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=6226788b5523b3ef69d42d676c629bdd 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_/images/cloudfront/create-record-alias.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=KT_Q5fTvRvVCZfQ_&q=85&s=3bf67b8316ac03caf74c1f63d3ed265f 2500w" />
</Frame>

5. 选择 **Create records**。

<Note>
  如果当前存在 A 记录，你可能需要将其删除。
</Note>

你的文档现已通过主域名中你选择的子路径对外可用。

<Note>
  配置好 DNS（域名系统）后，自定义子域通常会在几分钟内生效。DNS 传播有时可能需要 1–4 小时，极少数情况下可达 48 小时。如果您的子域未能立即生效，请先耐心等待，再进行故障排查。
</Note>


# Vercel
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/deploy/vercel

使用 Vercel 在自定义子路径上托管文档

export const VercelJsonGenerator = () => {
  const [subdomain, setSubdomain] = useState('[SUBDOMAIN]');
  const [subpath, setSubpath] = useState('[SUBPATH]');
  const vercelConfig = {
    rewrites: [{
      source: "/_mintlify/:path*",
      destination: `https://${subdomain}.mintlify.app/_mintlify/:path*`
    }, {
      source: "/api/request",
      destination: `https://${subdomain}.mintlify.app/_mintlify/api/request`
    }, {
      source: `/${subpath}`,
      destination: `https://${subdomain}.mintlify.app/${subpath}`
    }, {
      source: `/${subpath}/llms.txt`,
      destination: `https://${subdomain}.mintlify.app/llms.txt`
    }, {
      source: `/${subpath}/llms-full.txt`,
      destination: `https://${subdomain}.mintlify.app/llms-full.txt`
    }, {
      source: `/${subpath}/sitemap.xml`,
      destination: `https://${subdomain}.mintlify.app/sitemap.xml`
    }, {
      source: `/${subpath}/robots.txt`,
      destination: `https://${subdomain}.mintlify.app/robots.txt`
    }, {
      source: `/${subpath}/:path*`,
      destination: `https://${subdomain}.mintlify.app/${subpath}/:path*`
    }, {
      source: "/mintlify-assets/:path+",
      destination: `https://${subdomain}.mintlify.app/mintlify-assets/:path+`
    }]
  };
  const copyToClipboard = () => {
    navigator.clipboard.writeText(JSON.stringify(vercelConfig, null, 2)).then(() => {
      console.log('Copied config to clipboard!');
    }).catch(err => {
      console.error("Failed to copy: ", err);
    });
  };
  return <div className="p-4 border dark:border-white/10 rounded-2xl not-prose space-y-4">
      <div className="space-y-4">
        <div>
          <label className="block text-sm text-zinc-950/70 dark:text-white/70 mb-1">
            Subdomain
          </label>
          <input type="text" value={subdomain} onChange={e => setSubdomain(e.target.value)} placeholder="your-subdomain" className="w-full p-1 text-sm rounded border dark:border-white/10 bg-transparent" />
        </div>
        <div>
          <label className="block text-sm text-zinc-950/70 dark:text-white/70 mb-1">
            Subpath
          </label>
          <input type="text" value={subpath} onChange={e => setSubpath(e.target.value)} placeholder="docs" className="w-full p-1 text-sm rounded border dark:border-white/10 bg-transparent" />
        </div>
      </div>
      <div className="relative">
        <button onClick={copyToClipboard} className="absolute top-2 right-2 p-2 rounded-lg transition-all duration-200 group">
          <svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" className="w-4 h-4 dark:text-white/60 text-gray-400 group-hover:text-gray-500 dark:group-hover:text-white/60 transition-colors">
            <path d="M14.25 5.25H7.25C6.14543 5.25 5.25 6.14543 5.25 7.25V14.25C5.25 15.3546 6.14543 16.25 7.25 16.25H14.25C15.3546 16.25 16.25 15.3546 16.25 14.25V7.25C16.25 6.14543 15.3546 5.25 14.25 5.25Z" stroke="currentColor" strokeWidth="1.5" strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round"></path>
            <path d="M2.80103 11.998L1.77203 5.07397C1.61003 3.98097 2.36403 2.96397 3.45603 2.80197L10.38 1.77297C11.313 1.63397 12.19 2.16297 12.528 3.00097" stroke="currentColor" strokeWidth="1.5" strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round"></path>
          </svg>
          <span className="absolute top-9 left-1/2 transform -translate-x-1/2 bg-primary text-white text-xs px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-lg opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-200 whitespace-nowrap">
            Copy
          </span>
        </button>
        <pre className="p-4 rounded-lg overflow-auto text-xs border dark:border-white/10">
          <code>{JSON.stringify(vercelConfig, null, 2)}</code>
        </pre>
      </div>
    </div>;
};

<div id="verceljson-file">
  ## vercel.json 文件
</div>

`vercel.json` 文件用于配置项目的构建与部署方式。它位于项目根目录，控制部署的各个方面，包括路由、重定向、请求头和构建设置。

我们使用 `rewrites` 配置将来自主 domain 的请求代理到你的文档站点。

Rewrites 会在不更改浏览器中 URL 的情况下，将传入请求映射到不同的目标。当有人访问 `yoursite.com/docs` 时，Vercel 会在内部从 `your-subdomain.mintlify.dev/docs` 获取内容，但用户在浏览器中仍然看到 `yoursite.com/docs`。这与重定向不同，重定向会将用户带到另一个完全不同的 URL。

你可以将子路径自定义为任意你喜欢的值，例如 `/docs`、`/help` 或 `/guides`。此外，你也可以使用更深层级的嵌套子路径，如 `/product/docs`。

<div id="configuration">
  ## 配置
</div>

<div id="host-from-docs">
  ### 从 `/docs` 提供托管
</div>

1. 在你的控制台前往 [自定义 domain 设置](https://dashboard.mintlify.com/settings/deployment/custom-domain)。
2. 将 **在 `/docs` 托管** 开关切换为开启。

<Frame>
  <img alt="自定义 domain 设置页面的截图。“在 `/docs` 托管”开关已开启，并用橙色矩形标出。" src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/jUW68gfuWPLFPNlg/images/subpath/toggle-light.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=jUW68gfuWPLFPNlg&q=85&s=ac78e38c0f4d2c427446d97e0b9ecc8b" className="block dark:hidden" data-og-width="1438" width="1438" data-og-height="298" height="298" data-path="images/subpath/toggle-light.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/jUW68gfuWPLFPNlg/images/subpath/toggle-light.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=jUW68gfuWPLFPNlg&q=85&s=7c0720f495cb6aa3507a498ad5ebbe73 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/jUW68gfuWPLFPNlg/images/subpath/toggle-light.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=jUW68gfuWPLFPNlg&q=85&s=99c5b7cf5b7435b3123eb2a4ed986e7a 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/jUW68gfuWPLFPNlg/images/subpath/toggle-light.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=jUW68gfuWPLFPNlg&q=85&s=e58ab386f2c8df2d8fd15f0d5e72420c 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/jUW68gfuWPLFPNlg/images/subpath/toggle-light.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=jUW68gfuWPLFPNlg&q=85&s=991e5ea5cbbdfd881a3de31112764cd8 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/jUW68gfuWPLFPNlg/images/subpath/toggle-light.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=jUW68gfuWPLFPNlg&q=85&s=cd8dc0ca9213e5bee253f1fef93984dc 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/jUW68gfuWPLFPNlg/images/subpath/toggle-light.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=jUW68gfuWPLFPNlg&q=85&s=f4c06ab7f766eb2c8a7ca8a490d6bcb1 2500w" />

  <img alt="自定义 domain 设置页面的截图。“在 `/docs` 托管”开关已开启，并用橙色矩形标出。" src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/jUW68gfuWPLFPNlg/images/subpath/toggle-dark.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=jUW68gfuWPLFPNlg&q=85&s=fe025448518d6e8373e9275f5617b5ae" className="hidden dark:block" data-og-width="1440" width="1440" data-og-height="300" height="300" data-path="images/subpath/toggle-dark.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/jUW68gfuWPLFPNlg/images/subpath/toggle-dark.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=jUW68gfuWPLFPNlg&q=85&s=24193634fe247ede083cda84ded0638d 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/jUW68gfuWPLFPNlg/images/subpath/toggle-dark.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=jUW68gfuWPLFPNlg&q=85&s=be3a35bb83fc56efeed66c504129452f 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/jUW68gfuWPLFPNlg/images/subpath/toggle-dark.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=jUW68gfuWPLFPNlg&q=85&s=db296573c74628a58fa241cc877f42fd 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/jUW68gfuWPLFPNlg/images/subpath/toggle-dark.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=jUW68gfuWPLFPNlg&q=85&s=cdfea7b76c3d67068fb5caea5d9ed6bd 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/jUW68gfuWPLFPNlg/images/subpath/toggle-dark.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=jUW68gfuWPLFPNlg&q=85&s=81d2b0062e631367555c9663712e6e82 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/jUW68gfuWPLFPNlg/images/subpath/toggle-dark.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=jUW68gfuWPLFPNlg&q=85&s=3a9cd576ae857b3a42fa149d71db77fe 2500w" />
</Frame>

3. 输入你的 domain。
4. 选择 **添加 domain**。
5. 将以下重写规则添加到你的 `vercel.json` 文件中。将 `[subdomain]` 替换为你的子域：

```json  theme={null}
  {
    "rewrites": [
      {
        "source": "/docs",
        "destination": "https://[subdomain].mintlify.dev/docs"
      },
      {
        "source": "/docs/:match*",
        "destination": "https://[subdomain].mintlify.dev/docs/:match*"
      }
    ]
  }
```

* **`source`**: 你在 domain 上用于触发重写的路径模式。
* **`destination`**: 请求应被代理到的目标地址。
* **`:match*`**: 一个通配符，用于捕获子路径之后的任意路径片段。

更多信息请参阅 Vercel 文档：[使用 vercel.json 配置项目：Rewrites](https://vercel.com/docs/projects/project-configuration#rewrites)。

<div id="host-from-custom-path">
  ### 从自定义路径托管
</div>

要使用自定义子路径（`/docs` 之外的任意路径），必须在存储库中按该子路径的结构组织文档文件。举例来说，如果文档托管在 `yoursite.com/help`，则文档文件必须位于 `help/` 目录下。

使用下面的生成器创建重写配置，并将这些重写添加到 `vercel.json` 文件中。

<VercelJsonGenerator />

<div id="using-external-proxies-with-vercel">
  ## 在 Vercel 中使用外部代理
</div>

如果你在 Vercel 部署之前使用外部代理（例如 Cloudflare 或 AWS CloudFront），必须正确配置，避免与 Vercel 的 domain 验证和 SSL 证书签发产生冲突。

不当的代理配置可能会阻止 Vercel 配置 Let's Encrypt SSL 证书，并导致 domain 验证失败。

请参阅 Vercel 文档中的[受支持的提供商](https://vercel.com/guides/how-to-setup-verified-proxy#supported-providers-verified-proxy-lite)。

<div id="required-path-allowlist">
  ### 必需的路径允许列表
</div>

你的外部代理必须允许以下特定路径的流量通过，且不得阻止、重定向或进行过度缓存：

* `/.well-known/acme-challenge/*` - 用于 Let's Encrypt 证书验证
* `/.well-known/vercel/*` - 用于 Vercel domain 验证
* `/mintlify-assets/_next/static/*` - 用于静态资源

这些路径应直接透传到你的 Vercel 部署，不做任何修改。

<div id="header-forwarding-requirements">
  ### 请求头转发要求
</div>

确保你的代理正确转发 `HOST` 请求头。若未正确转发请求头，验证请求将失败。

<div id="testing-your-proxy-setup">
  ### 测试你的代理设置
</div>

要验证你的代理已正确配置：

1. 测试 `https://[yourdomain].com/.well-known/vercel/` 是否能返回响应。
2. 确保 SSL 证书已在你的 Vercel 控制台中正确签发。
3. 检查 domain 验证是否已成功完成。


# 可视化编辑器
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/editor

在浏览器中创建、维护和发布文档

<img className="block dark:hidden my-0 pointer-events-none" src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/editor-light.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=8d91aeaabac76f7b8067e74724dcc0f7" alt="浅色模式下的 Mintlify 可视化编辑器界面" data-og-width="1184" width="1184" data-og-height="320" height="320" data-path="images/editor/editor-light.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/editor-light.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=bfb28e67513b1be9e520f4f48962a6f4 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/editor-light.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=fb28fe9077a1cd01ec958fa94ef65b26 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/editor-light.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=268151ff9018f91769ead460c2a78dc6 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/editor-light.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=ab1d4d0751e5b9bcf4a696b73d2fe394 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/editor-light.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=2150b62403531c26cadecba0c12bdc7b 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/editor-light.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=3414002321bb7f2c4769a57da352cf7c 2500w" />

<img className="hidden dark:block my-0 pointer-events-none" src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/editor-dark.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=ebb3008d2a693c8f59b81604d8af020c" alt="深色模式下的 Mintlify 可视化编辑器界面" data-og-width="1184" width="1184" data-og-height="320" height="320" data-path="images/editor/editor-dark.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/editor-dark.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=897a34f742d17777be42a116fa6a0a88 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/editor-dark.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=5f906b115a5437309ef331fb7c9acf4c 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/editor-dark.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=c874875d4930351239d3d3d01781d844 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/editor-dark.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=80271b46bd9d53a8985c1a0d1646c740 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/editor-dark.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=358e49b23f7ee3d0917d203584a8ba58 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/editor-dark.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=bc5962c71d3460d84dc28ae6f6408ee8 2500w" />

从你的[控制台](https://dashboard.mintlify.com/editor)打开可视化编辑器，直接在浏览器中管理文档。

* **WYSIWYG（所见即所得）编辑**：使用所见即所得（WYSIWYG）编辑器修改文档，并实时预览发布后的效果。
* **Git 同步**：所有更改会自动与 Git 存储库同步，确保版本控制。
* **团队协作**：多人可同时编辑文档。
* **组件集成**：通过斜杠命令添加提示、代码块和其他组件。
* **无需配置**：可在控制台立即开始撰写。

<div id="overview">
  ## 概览
</div>

以下是在可视化编辑器中的常见工作方式：

<Steps>
  <Step title="Choose your branch">
    创建一个 branch，或直接在你的 部署用分支 上进行更改。我们建议先创建一个 branch，这样你可以在更改上线前进行预览。
  </Step>

  <Step title="Open your file">
    在侧边栏中定位到现有文件，或通过文件资源管理器创建新文件。
  </Step>

  <Step title="Edit your content">
    在可视化编辑器中进行修改。按下 <kbd>/</kbd> 打开组件菜单。
  </Step>

  <Step title="Preview your changes">
    可视化模式会展示你的更改在上线站点上的呈现效果。用它来核对一切是否正确。
  </Step>

  <Step title="Publish your changes">
    如果你在 部署用分支 上工作，可直接在可视化编辑器中发布更改。在其他 branch 上，你需要创建一个 拉取请求（PR；亦称“合并请求”/Merge Request） 以便在发布前进行评审。
  </Step>
</Steps>

<div id="editor-modes">
  ## 编辑器模式
</div>

可视化编辑器提供两种模式，以满足不同的编辑偏好和需求：可视化模式和 Markdown 模式。

使用编辑器工具栏中的模式切换开关在两种模式间切换。

  <img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/mode-toggle-dark.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=25362d53c1fc5d95b4a1a99a36c7f13c" alt="可视化编辑器中高亮显示的模式切换图标。" className="hidden dark:block" data-og-width="3016" width="3016" data-og-height="1212" height="1212" data-path="images/editor/mode-toggle-dark.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/mode-toggle-dark.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=c4606a10474d64606b46e5517e3233ed 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/mode-toggle-dark.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=475959e4e6496f0d64fdfd4469c3ab81 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/mode-toggle-dark.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=d73bfa95d162f2121db51d070196c5a6 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/mode-toggle-dark.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=2aa226b16b9a5a23e7193e16e6453d42 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/mode-toggle-dark.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=6ae17c35c06284184c23786a3fc39d00 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/mode-toggle-dark.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=c426b5f297d687240239ba331b2e81b5 2500w" />
</Frame>

<div id="visual-mode">
  ### 可视化模式
</div>

可视化模式提供 WYSIWYG（所见即所得）体验，你在编辑器中的更改会如实呈现为已发布文档的最终效果。此模式非常适合需要实时预览更改的场景。

<Frame>
  <img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/visual-mode-light.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=59a9f60783e85d80b1daeed509fe47e0" alt="Mintlify 可视化编辑器中的可视化编辑模式" className="block dark:hidden" data-og-width="3024" width="3024" data-og-height="1232" height="1232" data-path="images/editor/visual-mode-light.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/visual-mode-light.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=0702cb8556733851545809f75c9abae7 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/visual-mode-light.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=7a966802eca5df07402e94d0cd9c1d93 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/visual-mode-light.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=69c8847c2dfb117ccae89c8bbe79a32e 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/visual-mode-light.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=9250d61e55b853570f3f92332fa720bf 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/visual-mode-light.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=59ee630e6e9b1dc5b3b7adfc66586a97 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/visual-mode-light.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=f52b96f52e75443e5aea7e54efe5bb8b 2500w" />

  <img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/visual-mode-dark.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=16a4cc03b3302c0f72b0278175fbd6b3" alt="Mintlify 可视化编辑器中的可视化编辑模式" className="hidden dark:block" data-og-width="3018" width="3018" data-og-height="1226" height="1226" data-path="images/editor/visual-mode-dark.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/visual-mode-dark.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=e448cbd3076cafe0b70c9b430eb2efb3 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/visual-mode-dark.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=b985f59149b5a865ea6eba842d8a1a81 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/visual-mode-dark.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=5205f225898fb9820d2656e6c55df7a2 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/visual-mode-dark.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=2efebf829c7847be77bf6e4bb18f35b0 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/visual-mode-dark.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=deb91feb46e7c5530a1bd660633b2c7b 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/visual-mode-dark.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=d1db9cc47c9a44b0e8a85df6454c8a5d 2500w" />
</Frame>

<div id="markdown-mode">
  ### Markdown 模式
</div>

Markdown 模式可让你直接访问文档的底层 `MDX` 代码。当你需要对组件属性进行精细控制，或更倾向于使用 Markdown 语法编写时，此模式非常适合。

<Frame>
  <img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/markdown-mode-light.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=2f7a8c0a43d5e8ca86b3dd1f2ed21cea" alt="Mintlify 可视化编辑器中的 Markdown 模式" className="block dark:hidden" data-og-width="3024" width="3024" data-og-height="1248" height="1248" data-path="images/editor/markdown-mode-light.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/markdown-mode-light.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=0fb0be6440b294de2ddfc72b855addb3 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/markdown-mode-light.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=6cee7963ac970a2a2e0022b52e0aca0b 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/markdown-mode-light.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=cbd6bb3f80aaa6e35d8b2ececb0be790 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/markdown-mode-light.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=16a0f002f87c611ecbeeee0eaa206dcd 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/markdown-mode-light.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=40c57f06e1616c91c7ad7cb728fa776e 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/markdown-mode-light.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=dce9c190d248a49dbcaf479da03a524b 2500w" />

  <img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/markdown-mode-dark.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=a47c5b4a565c0e8ccf5d0a8be008ad9f" alt="Mintlify 可视化编辑器中的 Markdown 模式" className="hidden dark:block" data-og-width="3016" width="3016" data-og-height="1246" height="1246" data-path="images/editor/markdown-mode-dark.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/markdown-mode-dark.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=9a57aaed3b7e2fe7f3d2cc5c4451d143 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/markdown-mode-dark.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=17f6858b17b52b1d8921d6f24a910861 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/markdown-mode-dark.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=3d78fe2f32f563af05da7835a1484045 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/markdown-mode-dark.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=26764c50fb581f285db6deecec0d043e 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/markdown-mode-dark.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=8466f9200074f7b16e683ddb4d88b72b 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/editor/markdown-mode-dark.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=9d95f66b4296d214aa8c62bf37e05bbb 2500w" />
</Frame>

<div id="manage-content">
  ## 管理对象
</div>

<div id="navigate-your-files">
  ### 浏览文件
</div>

使用侧边栏的文件浏览器查看文档文件。单击任意文件即可在编辑器中打开。

在 macOS 上按 <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>P</kbd>，或在 Windows 上按 <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>P</kbd>，即可按名称搜索文件。

<div id="create-new-pages">
  ### 创建新页面
</div>

在文件资源管理器侧边栏中，选择 **Create a new file** 图标。

  />

文件名会自动添加 `.mdx` 扩展名。要更改文件类型，点击该扩展名，并在下拉菜单中选择你需要的类型。

  />
</Frame>

<div id="rename-pages">
  ### 重命名页面
</div>

要重命名页面，点击目标文件的省略号菜单 icon，并在下拉菜单中选择**Rename**。

<Frame>
  <img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/7OPTehQpVCaLhpve/images/editor/rename-light.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=7OPTehQpVCaLhpve&q=85&s=d6691d7f7a5e54089f6ed13aa79e2537" className="block dark:hidden" alt="在可视化编辑器中重命名页面" data-og-width="968" width="968" data-og-height="366" height="366" data-path="images/editor/rename-light.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/7OPTehQpVCaLhpve/images/editor/rename-light.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=7OPTehQpVCaLhpve&q=85&s=3e6c5d7217eac0f5cb85bfa7727e37aa 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/7OPTehQpVCaLhpve/images/editor/rename-light.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=7OPTehQpVCaLhpve&q=85&s=214bc3acb604dfd5684b1d87e5fe79cf 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/7OPTehQpVCaLhpve/images/editor/rename-light.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=7OPTehQpVCaLhpve&q=85&s=89e9d19082e64f0e585664e06af702a8 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/7OPTehQpVCaLhpve/images/editor/rename-light.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=7OPTehQpVCaLhpve&q=85&s=3ebccfa07480008ad09ef44ed7e3d326 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/7OPTehQpVCaLhpve/images/editor/rename-light.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=7OPTehQpVCaLhpve&q=85&s=96b17c3ff35d75c08e1d26aa906aa87a 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/7OPTehQpVCaLhpve/images/editor/rename-light.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=7OPTehQpVCaLhpve&q=85&s=51328384ad4fd2894b2c43a9eb48eef8 2500w" />

</Frame>

<div id="delete-pages">
  ### 删除页面
</div>

要删除页面，点击目标文件的三点菜单 icon，然后在下拉菜单中选择**Delete**。

<Frame>
  <img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/7OPTehQpVCaLhpve/images/editor/delete-page-light.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=7OPTehQpVCaLhpve&q=85&s=60941ea82cfd8c0d893c91b6e7ce2b93" className="block dark:hidden" alt="在可视化编辑器中删除页面。" data-og-width="968" width="968" data-og-height="366" height="366" data-path="images/editor/delete-page-light.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/7OPTehQpVCaLhpve/images/editor/delete-page-light.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=7OPTehQpVCaLhpve&q=85&s=911273db0ec873af7cf29ee3da7e587e 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/7OPTehQpVCaLhpve/images/editor/delete-page-light.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=7OPTehQpVCaLhpve&q=85&s=829b8d6995c91de5331d247a5a4859a9 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/7OPTehQpVCaLhpve/images/editor/delete-page-light.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=7OPTehQpVCaLhpve&q=85&s=6602332921d46e21ae27d688b8378e77 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/7OPTehQpVCaLhpve/images/editor/delete-page-light.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=7OPTehQpVCaLhpve&q=85&s=5e378731148e1199efe9dda7039f4630 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/7OPTehQpVCaLhpve/images/editor/delete-page-light.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=7OPTehQpVCaLhpve&q=85&s=6c0fde219f5f37b35b848b20a2d210f9 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/7OPTehQpVCaLhpve/images/editor/delete-page-light.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=7OPTehQpVCaLhpve&q=85&s=874825ac0d5acf40494a58988701cb4e 2500w" />
